title.rendered: LOLER and PUWER Inspection Plant Equipment and Machinery

content.rendered:
LOLER & PUWER Thorough Examination and Inspection:

Plant Equipment and Machinery

Click Here for a Free Quotation

Thorough Examination and Inspection of Plant Equipment and Machinery Under LOLER 1998 and PUWER 1998

Keeping Your Plant Equipment and Machinery Safe and Compliant...

Plant and Safety Limited are national providers in providing Engineering Testing, Inspection, and Certification services in order to keep your company, and your equipment compliant, ensuring that your employees are able to work safely and effectively.

Our national team of highly qualified and experienced engineers are able to provide Thorough Examinations and Inspections on all types of Plant Equipment and Plant Machinery in accordance with LOLER 1998 and PUWER 1998. 

Keeping equipment compliant can be a challenge, which is why our inspection database automatically plans the next due dates for each inspection, allowing us to notify our customers in advance when equipment needs to be inspected and certified again. 

Plant Equipment and Machinery Examination and Inspection Service

Plant and Safety can certify your Plant Equipment and Machinery in accordance with both LOLER 1998 and PUWER 1998. 

Our team of highly qualified and experienced engineers are experts in providing Thorough Examination and LOLER Inspection services for all types of Plant Equipment.

How Frequently Do I Need to Inspect Plant Equipment and Machinery?

In accordance with the requirements defined under the LOLER 1998 and PUWER 1998 Regulations, a competent person should carry out a thorough examination and inspection every 12 months, at minimum. 

Click Here to Learn More about LOLER 1998

Our LOLER and PUWER Inspection and Thorough Examination Services Cover All Types of Plant Equipment and Machinery

LOLER Inspection Testing Thorough Examination Excavators and Earth Moving Machinery
LOLER Inspection Testing Thorough Examination Telescopic Handler
LOLER Inspection Testing Thorough Examination Lorry Loaders
Dumper Truck
Road Roller Truck

WHY CHOOSE PLANT AND SAFETY?


Industry Experts

Our team has extensive experience in providing Testing, Inspection, Certification, and Training Services across all sectors within the UK. Our team of passionate industry experts work closely with our customers to keep their equipment and their people both safe and compliant


Quality Assurance

All of our services are backed by an extensive list of nationally recognised Accreditations and Industry Body Memberships. Our Accreditations and Memberships include ISO 9001, ISO 14001, OHSAS 18001, NPORS, CHAS, Safecontractor, Safe PQQ, ROSPA, and the British Safety Council


National Service Provider

Plant and Safety are a national provider of Testing, Inspection, Certification, and Training Services. Our national team of highly qualified, experienced, and competent trainers and engineers work closely with our customers to keep equipment and people both safe and compliant


Online Inspection Database

All of our Testing, Inspection, and Certification customers are automatically granted with access to our online inspection database to download examination reports for any equipment certified by Plant and Safety. Our inspection database runs on the industry leading ‘Motion Kinetic’ software



Get a Free Quote for Your LOLER and PUWER Inspection...

ACCREDITATIONS & MEMBERSHIPS

Plant and Safety Limited CHAS Accreditation
Plant and Safety Limited British Safety Council Membership
Plant and Safety Limited ROSPA Membership
Plant and Safety Limited NPORS Approved and Accredited Training Provider

Plant and Safety Limited CHAS Premium Plus Accreditation
Plant and Safety Safecontractor and SafePQQ Accreditation

CONTACT PLANT AND SAFETY LIMITED

T: 0330 113 7920

E: sales@plantandsafety.co.uk

Plant and Safety Ltd, Birmingham Road, Shenstone, Staffordshire, WS14 0LB

Plant Equipment Inspection, Excavator Inspection, Dumper Truck Inspection, Road Roller Inspection, Excavator LOLER Inspection. LOLER Plant Equipment, PUWER Plant Equipment, LOLER Inspection Plant Equipment, THorough Examination Plant Equipment, Thorough Examination Plant Equipment, Plant Equipment Thorough Examination, Excavator Thorough Examination, Excavator PUWER Inspection, Excavator LOLER Inspection, Hiab Inspection, Lorry Loader Inspection, Dumper Truck PUWER Inspection, LOLER Inspection Plant Equipment
